products.title: Logical Reasoning Test
products.description: A test to assess logical thinking and problem solving using patterns and sequences.

products.title: Verbal Ability Test
products.description: Evaluates comprehension, vocabulary and verbal reasoning.

products.title: Numerical Reasoning Test
products.description: Measures speed and accuracy with numbers, basic statistics and interpretation.

products.title: Abstract Reasoning Test
products.description: Assesses pattern recognition and abstract thinking using shapes and diagrams.

products.title: Situational Judgement Test
products.description: Measures judgment and decision-making in workplace scenarios.
